script

tests.text: Your consumedCalories variable should come after your if statement.
You should calculate the sum of breakfastCalories, lunchCalories, dinnerCalories, and snacksCalories, in order.
You should assign the sum of breakfastCalories, lunchCalories, dinnerCalories, and snacksCalories to consumedCalories.

description: It is time to start preparing your calculations. Start by declaring a consumedCalories variable, and assign it the sum of breakfastCalories, lunchCalories, dinnerCalories, and snacksCalories (note that order matters for the tests). Be sure to do this after your if statement.
